Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Solution structural studies in the membrane mimicking environments, sodium dodecyl sulphate (SDS), dodecylphosphocholine (DPC), and 1,2-dihexanoyl-sn-glycero-3-phosphatidylcholine (DHPC) micelles, indicate that these peptides display an alpha helical structure between residues Lys(3) and Val(21).(Ref.1)
Sequence Information.Function: Alyteserin-1c shows selective growth-inhibitory activity against Gram-negative bacteria.

Literature.Title: Conformational and membrane interaction studies of the antimicrobial peptide alyteserin-1c and its analogue [E4K]alyteserin-1c.
Literature.Author: Subasinghage AP, O'Flynn D, Conlon JM, Hewage CM.

Literature.Title: The alyteserins two families of antimicrobial peptides from the skin secretions of the midwife toad Alytes obstetricans (Alytidae).
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Demandt A, Nielsen PF, Leprince J, Vaudry H, Woodhams DC.
